_source.text: 1 head cauliflower, cut into florets 2 cups packed baby spinach heaping spoonful plain soy yogurt or better than sour cream 1/2 tsp salt dashes curry powder and turmeric black pepper

text: 1 head **cauliflower**, cut into florets 2 cups packed baby **spinach** heaping spoonful plain soy yogurt
or **better** **than** sour cream 1/2 tsp salt dashes curry powder and turmeric black pepper

_source.text: 92 points "Quite surprisingly, this is aromatically more elegant, at least at present with green apple, citrus blossom and subtle wood influence that is picked up by the big, rich, powerful and driving flavors that are actually no more concentrated but there is better depth, more minerality and a bit more length.

text: **apple**, citrus **blossom** and subtle wood influence that is picked up by the big, rich, powerful and
driving flavors that are actually no more concentrated but there **is** **better** depth, more minerality and a bit more length.
